00174 int nfs_read_worker_conf( config_file_t            in_config,
00175                           nfs_worker_parameter_t * pparam )
00176 {
00177   int     blk_index ;
00178   int     var_max ;
00179   int     var_index ;
00180   int     err ;
00181   char *  key_name ;
00182   char *  key_value ;
00183   
00184   /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00185   if( in_config == NULL || pparam == NULL  )
00186     return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00187   
00188   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00189   if( ( blk_index = config_GetBlockIndexByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_NFS_WORKER ) ) < 0 )
00190     {
00191       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_NFS_WORKER  ) ; */
00192       return  1 ;
00193     }
00194   
00195   var_max = config_GetNbKeys( in_config, blk_index ) ;
00196   
00197   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00198     {
00199       /* Get key's name */
00200       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( in_config,
00201                                       blk_index,
00202                                       var_index,
00203                                       &key_name,
00204                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00205         {
00206           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n", 
00207                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_NFS_WORKER ); 
00208           return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00209         }
00210       
00211       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Pending_Job_Prealloc" ) )
00212         {
00213           pparam->nb_pending_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00214         }
00215       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Nb_Before_GC" ) )
00216         {
00217           pparam->nb_before_gc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00218         }
00219       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Nb_DupReq_Prealloc" ) )
00220         {
00221           pparam->nb_dupreq_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00222         }
00223       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Nb_DupReq_Before_GC" ) )
00224         {
00225           pparam->nb_dupreq_before_gc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00226         }
00227       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Nb_Client_Id_Prealloc" ) )
00228         {
00229           pparam->nb_client_id_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00230         }
00231       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Nb_IP_Stats_Prealloc" ) )
00232         {
00233           pparam->nb_ip_stats_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00234         }
00235       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "LRU_Pending_Job_Prealloc_PoolSize" ) )
00236         {
00237           pparam->lru_param.nb_entry_prealloc  = atoi( key_value ) ;
00238         }
00239       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "LRU_DupReq_Prealloc_PoolSize" ) )
00240         {
00241           pparam->lru_dupreq.nb_entry_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00242         }
00243       else
00244         {
00245           fprintf( stderr,
00246                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00247                    key_name, CONF_LABEL_NFS_WORKER ) ;
00248           return -1 ;
00249         }
00250       
00251     }
00252   
00253 
00254   return 0 ;
00255 } /* nfs_read_worker_conf */
00256 
00257 
00258 
00271 int nfs_read_core_conf( config_file_t          in_config,
00272                         nfs_core_parameter_t * pparam )
00273 {
00274   int     blk_index ;
00275   int     var_max ;
00276   int     var_index ;
00277   int     err ;
00278   char *  key_name ;
00279   char *  key_value ;
00280   
00281   /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00282   if( in_config == NULL || pparam == NULL  )
00283     return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00284   
00285   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00286   if( ( blk_index = config_GetBlockIndexByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_NFS_CORE ) ) < 0 )
00287     {
00288       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_NFS_CORE  ) ; */
00289       return  1 ;
00290     }
00291   
00292   var_max = config_GetNbKeys( in_config, blk_index ) ;
00293   
00294  
00295   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00296     {
00297       /* Get key's name */
00298       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( in_config,
00299                                       blk_index,
00300                                       var_index,
00301                                       &key_name,
00302                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00303         {
00304           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00305                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_NFS_CORE ) ;
00306           return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00307         }
00308 
00309       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Nb_Worker" ) )
00310         {
00311           pparam->nb_worker = atoi( key_value ) ;
00312         }
00313       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Nb_MaxConcurrentGC" ) ) 
00314         {
00315           pparam->nb_max_concurrent_gc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00316         }
00317       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "DupReq_Expiration" ) )
00318         {
00319           pparam->expiration_dupreq = atoi( key_value ) ;
00320         }
00321       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "NFS_Port" ) )
00322         {
00323           pparam->nfs_port = (unsigned short)atoi( key_value ) ;
00324         }
00325       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Drop_IO_Errors" ) ) 
00326         {
00327           pparam->drop_io_errors = StrToBoolean( key_value ) ;
00328         }
00329       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Drop_Inval_Errors" ) ) 
00330         {
00331           pparam->drop_inval_errors = StrToBoolean( key_value ) ;
00332         }
00333       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "MNT_Port" ) )
00334         {
00335           pparam->mnt_port = (unsigned short)atoi( key_value ) ;
00336         }
00337       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "NFS_Program" ) )
00338         {
00339           pparam->nfs_program = atoi( key_value ) ;
00340         }
00341       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "MNT_Program" ) )
00342         {
00343           pparam->mnt_program = atoi( key_value ) ;
00344         }
00345       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Core_Dump_Size" ) ) 
00346         {
00347           pparam->core_dump_size = atol( key_value ) ;
00348         }
00349       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Stats_File_Path" ) )
00350         {
00351           strncpy( pparam->stats_file_path, key_value, MAXPATHLEN ) ;
00352         }
00353       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Stats_Update_Delay" ) )
00354         {
00355           pparam->stats_update_delay = atoi( key_value ) ;
00356         }
00357       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Dump_Stats_Per_Client" ) )
00358         {
00359           pparam->dump_stats_per_client = StrToBoolean( key_value ) ;
00360         }
00361       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Stats_Per_Client_Directory" ) )
00362         {
00363           strncpy( pparam->stats_per_client_directory, key_value, MAXPATHLEN ) ;
00364         }
00365       else
00366         {
00367           fprintf( stderr,
00368                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00369                    key_name, CONF_LABEL_NFS_CORE ) ;
00370           return -1 ;
00371         }
00372       
00373     }
00374   
00375 
00376   return 0 ;
00377 } /* nfs_read_core_conf */

00391 int nfs_read_dupreq_hash_conf( config_file_t                in_config,
00392                                nfs_rpc_dupreq_parameter_t * pparam )
00393 {
00394   int     blk_index ;
00395   int     var_max ;
00396   int     var_index ;
00397   int     err ;
00398   char *  key_name ;
00399   char *  key_value ;
00400 
00401    /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00402   if( in_config == NULL || pparam == NULL )
00403     return -1 ;
00404 
00405   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00406   if( ( blk_index = config_GetBlockIndexByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_NFS_DUPREQ ) ) < 0 )
00407     {
00408       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_NFS_DUPREQ ) ; */
00409       return 1 ;
00410     }
00411   
00412   var_max = config_GetNbKeys( in_config, blk_index ) ;
00413 
00414   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00415     {
00416       /* Get key's name */
00417       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( in_config,
00418                                       blk_index,
00419                                       var_index,
00420                                       &key_name,
00421                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00422         {
00423           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00424                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_NFS_DUPREQ ) ;
00425           return  -1 ;
00426         }
00427 
00428       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Index_Size" ) )
00429         {
00430           pparam->hash_param.index_size = atoi( key_value ) ;
00431         }
00432       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Alphabet_Length" ) )
00433         {
00434           pparam->hash_param.alphabet_length = atoi( key_value ) ;
00435         }
00436       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Prealloc_Node_Pool_Size" ) ) 
00437         {
00438           pparam->hash_param.nb_node_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00439         }
00440       else
00441         {
00442            fprintf( stderr,
00443                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00444                     key_name, CONF_LABEL_NFS_DUPREQ ) ;
00445            return -1 ;
00446         }
00447     }
00448   
00449 
00450   return  0 ;
00451 } /* nfs_read_dupreq_hash_conf */

00466 int nfs_read_ip_name_conf( config_file_t             in_config,
00467                            nfs_ip_name_parameter_t * pparam )
00468 {
00469   int     blk_index ;
00470   int     var_max ;
00471   int     var_index ;
00472   int     err ;
00473   char *  key_name ;
00474   char *  key_value ;
00475 
00476    /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00477   if( in_config == NULL || pparam == NULL )
00478     return -1 ;
00479 
00480   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00481   if( ( blk_index = config_GetBlockIndexByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_NFS_IP_NAME ) ) < 0 )
00482     {
00483       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_NFS_IP_NAME ) ; */
00484       return 1 ;
00485     }
00486   
00487   var_max = config_GetNbKeys( in_config, blk_index ) ;
00488 
00489   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00490     {
00491       /* Get key's name */
00492       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( in_config,
00493                                       blk_index,
00494                                       var_index,
00495                                       &key_name,
00496                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00497         {
00498           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00499                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_NFS_IP_NAME ) ;
00500           return  -1 ;
00501         }
00502 
00503       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Index_Size" ) )
00504         {
00505           pparam->hash_param.index_size = atoi( key_value ) ;
00506         }
00507       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Alphabet_Length" ) )
00508         {
00509           pparam->hash_param.alphabet_length = atoi( key_value ) ;
00510         }
00511       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Prealloc_Node_Pool_Size" ) ) 
00512         {
00513           pparam->hash_param.nb_node_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00514         }
00515       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Expiration_Time" ) )
00516         {
00517           pparam->expiration_time = atoi( key_value ) ;
00518         }
00519       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Map" ) ) 
00520         {
00521            strncpy( pparam->mapfile, key_value, MAXPATHLEN ) ;
00522         }
00523       else
00524         {
00525            fprintf( stderr,
00526                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00527                     key_name, CONF_LABEL_NFS_IP_NAME ) ;
00528            return -1 ;
00529         }
00530     }
00531   
00532 
00533   return  0 ;
00534 } /* nfs_read_ip_name_conf */

00548 int nfs_read_client_id_conf( config_file_t               in_config,
00549                              nfs_client_id_parameter_t * pparam )
00550 {
00551   int     blk_index ;
00552   int     var_max ;
00553   int     var_index ;
00554   int     err ;
00555   char *  key_name ;
00556   char *  key_value ;
00557 
00558    /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00559   if( in_config == NULL || pparam == NULL )
00560     return -1 ;
00561 
00562   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00563   if( ( blk_index = config_GetBlockIndexByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_CLIENT_ID ) ) < 0 )
00564     {
00565       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_CLIENT_ID ) ; */
00566       return 1 ;
00567     }
00568 
00569   var_max = config_GetNbKeys( in_config, blk_index ) ;
00570 
00571   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00572     {
00573       /* Get key's name */
00574       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( in_config,
00575                                       blk_index,
00576                                       var_index,
00577                                       &key_name,
00578                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00579         {
00580           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00581                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_CLIENT_ID ) ;
00582           return  -1 ;
00583         }
00584 
00585       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Index_Size" ) )
00586         {
00587           pparam->hash_param.index_size = atoi( key_value ) ;
00588         }
00589       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Alphabet_Length" ) )
00590         {
00591           pparam->hash_param.alphabet_length = atoi( key_value ) ;
00592         }
00593       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Prealloc_Node_Pool_Size" ) )
00594         {
00595           pparam->hash_param.nb_node_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00596         }
00597       else
00598         {
00599            fprintf( stderr,
00600                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00601                     key_name, CONF_LABEL_CLIENT_ID ) ;
00602            return -1 ;
00603         }
00604     }
00605 
00606 
00607   return  0 ;
00608 } /* nfs_client_id_conf */

00622 int nfs_read_state_id_conf( config_file_t               in_config,

00634     return -1 ;

00638     {

00640       return 1 ;
00641     }
00642 
00643   var_max = config_GetNbKeys( in_config, blk_index ) ;

00645   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00646     {

00649                                       blk_index,
00650                                       var_index,
00651                                       &key_name,

00656           return  -1 ;

00660         {

00697 int nfs_read_uidmap_conf( config_file_t                 in_config,
00698                           nfs_idmap_cache_parameter_t * pparam )
00699 {
00700   int     blk_index ;
00701   int     var_max ;
00702   int     var_index ;
00703   int     err ;
00704   char *  key_name ;
00705   char *  key_value ;
00706 
00707    /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00708   if( in_config == NULL || pparam == NULL )
00709     return -1 ;
00710 
00711   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00712   if( ( blk_index = config_GetBlockIndexByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_UID_MAPPER ) ) < 0 )
00713     {
00714       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_CLIENT_ID ) ; */
00715       return 1 ;
00716     }
00717 
00718   var_max = config_GetNbKeys( in_config, blk_index ) ;
00719 
00720   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00721     {
00722       /* Get key's name */
00723       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( in_config,
00724                                       blk_index,
00725                                       var_index,
00726                                       &key_name,
00727                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00728         {
00729           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00730                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_UID_MAPPER ) ;
00731           return  -1 ;
00732         }
00733 
00734       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Index_Size" ) )
00735         {
00736           pparam->hash_param.index_size = atoi( key_value ) ;
00737         }
00738       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Alphabet_Length" ) )
00739         {
00740           pparam->hash_param.alphabet_length = atoi( key_value ) ;
00741         }
00742       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Prealloc_Node_Pool_Size" ) )
00743         {
00744           pparam->hash_param.nb_node_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00745         }
00746       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Map" ) )
00747         {
00748           strncpy( pparam->mapfile, key_value, MAXPATHLEN ) ;
00749         }
00750       else
00751         {
00752            fprintf( stderr,
00753                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00754                     key_name, CONF_LABEL_UID_MAPPER ) ;
00755            return -1 ;
00756         }
00757     }
00758 
00759   return  0 ;
00760 } /* nfs_read_uidmap_conf */

00777 {

00779   int     var_max ;

00781   int     err ;

00787     return -1 ;

00790   if( ( blk_index = config_GetBlockIndexByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_GID_MAPPER ) ) < 0 )
00791     {
00792       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_CLIENT_ID ) ; */
00793       return 1 ;
00794     }
00795 
00796   var_max = config_GetNbKeys( in_config, blk_index ) ;
00797

00799     {

00802                                       blk_index,
00803                                       var_index,
00804                                       &key_name,
00805                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00806         {
00807           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00808                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_GID_MAPPER ) ;
00809           return  -1 ;
00810         }
00811 
00812       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Index_Size" ) )
00813         {
00814           pparam->hash_param.index_size = atoi( key_value ) ;
00815         }
00816       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Alphabet_Length" ) )
00817         {

00819         }
00820       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Prealloc_Node_Pool_Size" ) )

00823         }
00824       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Map" ) )
00825         {

00827         }
00828       else
00829         {
00830            fprintf( stderr,
00831                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00832                     key_name, CONF_LABEL_GID_MAPPER ) ;
00833            return -1 ;
00834         }
00835     }
00836 
00837   return  0 ;

00853 int nfs_read_krb5_conf( config_file_t            in_config,
00854                         nfs_krb5_parameter_t *   pparam )
00855 { 
00856   int     blk_index ;
00857   int     var_max ;
00858   int     var_index ;
00859   int     err ;
00860   char *  key_name ;
00861   char *  key_value ;
00862 
00863    /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00864   if( in_config == NULL || pparam == NULL )
00865     return -1 ;
00866 
00867   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00868   if( ( blk_index = config_GetBlockIndexByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_NFS_KRB5 ) ) < 0 )
00869     {
00870       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_NFS_KRB5 ) ; */
00871       return 1 ;
00872     }
00873 
00874   var_max = config_GetNbKeys( in_config, blk_index ) ;
00875 
00876   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00877     {
00878       /* Get key's name */
00879       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( in_config,
00880                                       blk_index,
00881                                       var_index,
00882                                       &key_name,
00883                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00884         {
00885           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00886                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_NFS_KRB5 ) ;
00887           return  -1 ;
00888         }
00889     
00890       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "PrincipalName" ) ) 
00891         {
00892           strncpy( pparam->principal, key_value, MAXNAMLEN ) ;
00893         }
00894       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "KeytabPath" ) ) 
00895         {
00896           strncpy( pparam->keytab, key_value, MAXPATHLEN ) ;
00897         }  
00898       else
00899         {
00900            fprintf( stderr,
00901                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00902                     key_name, CONF_LABEL_NFS_KRB5 ) ;
00903            return -1 ;
00904         }
00905       }
00906 
00907   return 0 ;
00908 } /* nfs_read_krb5_conf */

00924 int nfs_read_version4_conf( config_file_t                in_config,
00925                             nfs_version4_parameter_t *   pparam )
00926 {
00927   int     blk_index ;
00928   int     var_max ;
00929   int     var_index ;
00930   int     err ;
00931   char *  key_name ;
00932   char *  key_value ;
00933 
00934    /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00935   if( in_config == NULL || pparam == NULL )
00936     return -1 ;
00937 
00938   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00939   if( ( blk_index = config_GetBlockIndexByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_NFS_VERSION4 ) ) < 0 )
00940     {
00941       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_NFS_VERSION4 ) ; */
00942       return 1 ;
00943     }
00944 
00945   var_max = config_GetNbKeys( in_config, blk_index ) ;
00946 
00947   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00948     {
00949       /* Get key's name */
00950       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( in_config,
00951                                       blk_index,
00952                                       var_index,
00953                                       &key_name,
00954                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00955         {
00956           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00957                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_NFS_VERSION4 ) ;
00958           return  -1 ;
00959         }
00960 
00961       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Lease_Lifetime" ) )
00962         {
00963           pparam->lease_lifetime = atoi( key_value ) ; 
00964         }
00965       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "FH_Expire" ) ) 
00966         {
00967           pparam->fh_expire = StrToBoolean( key_value ) ;
00968         }
00969       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Returns_ERR_FH_EXPIRED" ) )
00970         {
00971           pparam->returns_err_fh_expired = StrToBoolean( key_value ) ;
00972         }
00973       else
00974         {
00975            fprintf( stderr,
00976                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00977                     key_name, CONF_LABEL_NFS_VERSION4 ) ;
00978            return -1 ;
00979         }
00980       }
00981 
00982   return 0 ;
00983 } /* nfs_read_version4_conf */

00997 {
00998   DisplayLog( "NFS PARAM : worker_param.lru_param.nb_entry_prealloc = %d", 
00999               pparam->lru_param.nb_entry_prealloc) ;
01000   DisplayLog( "NFS PARAM : worker_param.nb_pending_prealloc = %d",  pparam->nb_pending_prealloc ) ;
01001   DisplayLog( "NFS PARAM : worker_param.nb_before_gc = %d",  pparam->nb_before_gc ) ;
01002 } /* Print_param_worker_in_log */

01016 {
